xyz.fsgik.common.io

Class FsIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.xyz.fsgek.common.FsIO

  • public class FsIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Input/Output utilities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int IO_BUFFER_SIZE
      Default IO buffer size: 1024 * 8 = 8192.

    • Method Detail

      • readBytes

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable byte[] readBytes(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Reads all bytes from given input stream. Return null if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - given input stream
        Returns:
        all bytes from given input stream

      • readBytes

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable byte[] readBytes(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                                    int limit)
        Reads specified limit number of bytes from given input stream. Return null if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.

        If the limit number < 0, read all bytes; els if limit number is 0, no read and return; else this method will keep reading bytes until it reaches the limit or the end of the stream.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - given input stream
        limit - specified limit number
        Returns:
        specified limit number of bytes from given input stream

      • readBytesTo

        public static long readBytesTo(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                               java.io.OutputStream dest)
        Reads all bytes from given input stream to given dest stream, returns actual read number. Return -1 if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - given input stream
        dest - given dest stream
        Returns:
        actual read number

      • readBytesTo

        public static long readBytesTo(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                               java.io.OutputStream dest,
                               int limit)
        Reads specified limit number of bytes from given input stream to given dest stream, returns actual read number. Return -1 if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.

        If the limit number < 0, read all bytes; els if limit number is 0, no read and return; else this method will keep reading bytes until it reaches the limit or the end of the stream.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - given input stream
        dest - given dest stream
        limit - specified limit number
        Returns:
        actual read number

      • readBytesTo

        public static long readBytesTo(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                               java.io.OutputStream dest,
                               int limit,
                               int bufferSize)
        Reads specified limit number of bytes from given input stream to given dest stream, returns actual read number. Return -1 if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.

        If the limit number < 0, read all bytes; els if limit number is 0, no read and return; else this method will keep reading bytes until it reaches the limit or the end of the stream.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - given input stream
        dest - given dest stream
        limit - specified limit number
        bufferSize - buffer size for each reading and writing
        Returns:
        actual read number

        Returns:

      • readString

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.String readString(java.io.Reader reader,
                                                               int limit)
        Reads specified limit number of chars as string from given reader. Return null if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.

        If the limit number < 0, read all bytes; els if limit number is 0, no read and return; else this method will keep reading chars until it reaches the limit or the end of the reader.

        Parameters:
        reader - given reader
        limit - specified limit number
        Returns:
        specified limit number of chars as string from given reader

      • readCharsTo

        public static long readCharsTo(java.io.Reader reader,
                               java.lang.Appendable dest)
        Reads all chars from given reader to given dest output, returns actual read number. Return -1 if no data read out and reach to the end of stream.

        If the limit number < 0, read all chars; els if limit number is 0, no read and return; else this method will keep reading chars until it reaches the limit or the end of the reader.

        Parameters:
        reader - given reader
        dest - given dest stream
        Returns:
        actual read number

        limit - specified limit number

public static @Nullable java.lang.String avalaibleString(java.io.InputStream inputStream)

        Returns:

      • toInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream toInputStream(java.io.RandomAccessFile random)
        Wraps given random access file as an input stream, supports mark/reset.

        Note this method will seek position of random access file to given offset immediately.

        Parameters:
        random - given random access file
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

      • toInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream toInputStream(java.io.RandomAccessFile random,
                                                long offset,
                                                long length)
        Wraps given random access file as an input stream, readable bytes from offset position to (offset + length), supports mark/reset. length can be set to -1 if to read to end of the file.

        Note this method will seek position of random access file to given offset immediately.

        Parameters:
        random - given random access file
        offset - offset position to start read
        length - length of readable bytes, or -1 to read to end of file
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

      • toOutputStream

        public static java.io.OutputStream toOutputStream(java.lang.Appendable appendable)
        Wraps given appendable as an output stream with FsChars.defaultCharset().

        Note OutputStream.flush() and OutputStream.close() are valid for given appendable if it is instance of Writer.

        Parameters:
        appendable - given appendable
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

      • toOutputStream

        public static java.io.OutputStream toOutputStream(java.io.RandomAccessFile random)
        Wraps given random access file as an output stream. The stream will lock the file with exclusive lock by FileChannel.tryLock(long, long, boolean).

        Note this method will seek position of random access file to given offset immediately.

        Parameters:
        random - given random access file
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

      • toOutputStream

        public static java.io.OutputStream toOutputStream(java.io.RandomAccessFile random,
                                                  long offset,
                                                  long length)
        Wraps given random access file as an output stream, written bytes from offset position to (offset + length). length can be set to -1 if to write unlimitedly. The stream will lock the file with exclusive lock by FileChannel.tryLock(long, long, boolean).

        Note this method will seek position of random access file to given offset immediately.

        Parameters:
        random - given random access file
        offset - offset position to start write
        length - length of written bytes, or -1 to write unlimitedly
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

      • limited

        public static java.io.InputStream limited(java.io.InputStream source,
                                          long limit)
        Wraps given source stream to limit read length. Note returned stream doesn't support mark/reset.
        Parameters:
        source - given source stream
        limit - max read length, must >= 0
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

      • limited

        public static java.io.OutputStream limited(java.io.OutputStream source,
                                           long limit)
        Wraps given source stream to limit written length.
        Parameters:
        source - given source stream
        limit - max written length, must >= 0
        Returns:
        wrapped stream

        public static byte[] readBytes(java.nio.file.Path path)

        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        Returns:
        read bytes

      • readBytes

        public static byte[] readBytes(java.nio.file.Path path,
                               long offset,
                               long length)
        Using RandomAccessFile to read given length bytes of given file of path from offset position, the given length may be set to -1 to read to end of file.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        offset - offset position
        length - given length, maybe -1 to read to end of file
        Returns:
        read bytes

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Using RandomAccessFile to read all bytes of given file of path. The read bytes will be encoded to String with FsChars.defaultCharset().
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        Returns:
        read string

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                          java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Using RandomAccessFile to read all bytes of given file of path. The read bytes will be encoded to String with given charset.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        charset - given charset
        Returns:
        read string

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                          long offset,
                                          long length)
        Using RandomAccessFile to read given length bytes of given file of path from offset position, the given length may be set to -1 to read to end of file. The read bytes will be encoded to String with FsChars.defaultCharset().
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        offset - offset position
        length - given length, maybe -1 to read to end of file
        Returns:
        read string

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                          long offset,
                                          long length,
                                          java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Using RandomAccessFile to read given length bytes of given file of path from offset position, the given length may be set to -1 to read to end of file. The read bytes will be encoded to String with given charset.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        offset - offset position
        length - given length, maybe -1 to read to end of file
        charset - given charset
        Returns:
        read string

      • writeBytes

        public static void writeBytes(java.nio.file.Path path,
                              java.io.InputStream data)
        Using RandomAccessFile to write bytes into given file of path.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        data - given data

      • writeBytes

        public static void writeBytes(java.nio.file.Path path,
                              long offset,
                              long length,
                              java.io.InputStream data)
        Using RandomAccessFile to write given length bytes into given file of path from offset position, the given length may be set to -1 to write unlimitedly.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        offset - offset position
        length - given length, maybe -1 to write unlimitedly
        data - given data

      • writeString

        public static void writeString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                               java.lang.CharSequence data)
        Using RandomAccessFile to write given data into given file. The written bytes will be decoded from given data with FsChars.defaultCharset().
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        data - given data

      • writeString

        public static void writeString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                               java.lang.CharSequence data,
                               java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Using RandomAccessFile to write given data into given file. The written bytes will be decoded from given data with given charset.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        data - given data
        charset - given charset

      • writeString

        public static void writeString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                               long offset,
                               long length,
                               java.lang.CharSequence data)
        Using RandomAccessFile to write given data into given file of path from offset position, the given length may be set to -1 to write unlimitedly. The written bytes will be decoded from given data with FsChars.defaultCharset().
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        offset - offset position
        length - given length, maybe -1 to write unlimitedly
        data - given data

      • writeString

        public static void writeString(java.nio.file.Path path,
                               long offset,
                               long length,
                               java.lang.CharSequence data,
                               java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Using RandomAccessFile to write given data into given file of path from offset position, the given length may be set to -1 to write unlimitedly. The written bytes will be decoded from given data with given charset.
        Parameters:
        path - given file of path
        offset - offset position
        length - given length, maybe -1 to write unlimitedly
        data - given data
        charset - given charset
